title: What the Kyle Rittenhouse Trial Says About America
sub_head: Students weigh in on American culture and the criminal-justice system.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss the Kyle Rittenhouse trial. Next week we’ll ask, “Mark Zuckerberg has announced that we will all soon move into a metaverse, with our business and even personal interactions taking place in an ever-more realistic virtual space. Should we welcome this, or flee from it back to the physical world?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Nov. 30. The best responses will be published that night.
